mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_Daily_Stat_Customer(
) SELECT BB.Customer_id,DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') Stat_Dt, IFNULL(Order_Count,0),IFNULL(Order_Amount,0),IFNULL(Income_Amount,0),IFNULL(Receivable_Amount,0),'admin' ,now() from ( SELECT a.customer_Id, count(Work_Seq) Order_Count, SUM(Product_Price) Order_Amount FROM TB_Work_Bottle A WHERE Bottle_Work_Cd in ('0308','0309','0314','0316') AND DATE_FORMAT(A.Create_Dt,'%Y/%m/%d') = DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') GROUP BY A.customer_Id ) AA right join ( SELECT B.Customer_id, SUM(Income_Amount) Income_Amount,SUM(Receivable_Amount) Receivable_Amount FROM tb_cash_flow B WHERE DATE_FORMAT(B.Create_Dt,'%Y/%m/%d') = DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') GROUP BY B.customer_Id ) BB on BB.Customer_id = AA.Customer_id

INSERT INTO TB_Monthly_Stat_Customer(
) SELECT Customer_ID , LEFT(Stat_Dt,7) , SUM(Order_Count) , SUM(Order_Amount) , SUM(Income_Amount) , SUM(Receivable_Amount) , 'admin' , NOW() FROM TB_Daily_Stat_customer WHERE LEFT(Stat_Dt,7)= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m') GROUP BY Customer_ID,LEFT(Stat_Dt,7)
mapper.update: DELETE FROM TB_Daily_Stat_Customer WHERE Stat_Dt = DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') AND Order_Count = 0 AND Order_Amount = 0 AND Income_Amount = 0 AND Receivable_Amount = 0
